akn:section.akn:heading: Management rights; matters subject to collective bargaining.

akn:content.akn:p: The respective personnel authorities (management) shall retain the sole right, in accordance with applicable laws and rules and regulations:

An act, exercise, or agreement of the respective personnel authorities (management) shall not be interpreted in any manner as a waiver of the sole management rights contained in subsection (a) of this section.
All matters shall be deemed negotiable except those that are proscribed by this subchapter. Negotiations concerning compensation are authorized to the extent provided in ยง 1-617.16.
